# isAutoVideoFrameRateSupported

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that Indicates whether the format supports performing automatic video frame rate adjustments.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAutoVideoFrameRateSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property determines whether you can enable a capture device’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/isAutoVideoFrameRateEnabled] property.

## Determining video capture support

- **videoSupportedFrameRateRanges**: A list of frame rate ranges that a format supports.
- **AVFrameRateRange**: An immutable type that represents a range of valid frame rates.
- **isVideoBinned**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the format produces video data in a binned format.
- **isVideoHDRSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports high dynamic range streaming.
- **isMultiCamSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether a multi-camera capture session supports this format.
